name.description: Globally unique identifying string for each environment, usually the same as the environment folder name.

title.description: Verbose string title for human display.

episodeSteps.description: Maximum number of steps in the episode.

actTimeout.description: Maximum runtime (seconds) to obtain an action from an agent.

runTimeout.description: Maximum runtime (seconds) of an episode (not necessarily DONE).

agentCount.description: Total number of agents that will participate in the episode.

action.description: Value returned from the agent based on the observation.

reward.description: Reward generated by environment in response to agent action.

remainingOverageTime.description: Total remaining banked time (seconds) that can be used in excess of per-step actTimeouts -- agent is disqualified with TIMEOUT status when this drops below 0.

status.description: Agent status caused by stepping through the environment.
